name: AGameForKimi
description:
A game I will further add content to for my dear friend kimi, who is struggling with mental health lately.

It features inside jokes and references to our fav game "Werwolf"

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe. Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai "Game-A-Week"  (WinterSemester 2020/21)
